name: My Super Cave Boy
description:
This is my very first game, a simple and little platformer I made by learning from the udemy course of Benjamin Anderson (aka Heartbeast).

Manual:

Use left and right arrows to move, up to jump and to enter through doors, down to let yourself fall from a ledge

oh, i almost forgot, it also works with a xBox controller!

If you want, leave a feedback :D

Credits:

All sounds and art done by Benjamin Kean Anderson, copyright 2015, all rights reserved.

Music by Keven Macleod:
